## Discovery of blood biomarker for stroke diagnosis

The project focuses on the development of rapid, blood-based diagnostic tools for stroke recognition. Leveraging prior work identifying brain-specific genes and their associated nucleic acids, this investigation seeks to utilize cell-free nucleic acids as biomarkers for stroke.
